02383                 }
02384                 else {
02385                     content = NULL;
02386                     n -= 1;
02387                 }
02388             }
02389         }
02390         if (min_stale < a)
02391             h->min_stale = min_stale;
02392         else if (a > limit) {
02393             h->min_stale = ~0;
02394             h->max_stale = 0;
02395         }
02396         else
02397             h->min_stale = a;
02398         if (check_limit <= 0)
02399             return(5000);
02400     }
02401     else {
02402         /* Make oldish content stale, for cleanup on next round */
02403         limit = h->accession;
02404         ignore = CCN_CONTENT_ENTRY_STALE | CCN_CONTENT_ENTRY_PRECIOUS;
02405         for (a = h->accession_base; a <= limit && n > h->capacity; a++) {
02406             content = content_from_accession(h, a);
02407             if (content != NULL && (content->flags & ignore) == 0) {
02408                 mark_stale(h, content);
02409                 n--;
02410             }
02411         }
02412         ev->evint = 0;
02413         return(5000);
02414     }
02415     h->clean = NULL;
02416     return(0);
02417 }
02418 
02419 /**
02420  * Schedule clean_daemon, if it is not already scheduled.
02421  */
02422 static void
02423 clean_needed(struct ccnd_handle *h)
02424 {
02425     if (h->clean == NULL)
02426         h->clean = ccn_schedule_event(h->sched, 5000, clean_daemon, NULL, 0);
02427 }
02428 
02429 /**
02430  * Age out the old forwarding table entries
02431  */
02432 static int
02433 age_forwarding(struct ccn_schedule *sched,
02434              void *clienth,
02435              struct ccn_scheduled_event *ev,
02436              int flags)
02437 {
02438     struct ccnd_handle *h = clienth;
02439     struct hashtb_enumerator ee;
02440     struct hashtb_enumerator *e = &ee;
02441     struct ccn_forwarding *f;
02442     struct ccn_forwarding *next;
02443     struct ccn_forwarding **p;
02444     struct nameprefix_entry *npe;
02445     
02446     if ((flags & CCN_SCHEDULE_CANCEL) != 0) {
02447         h->age_forwarding = NULL;
02448         return(0);
02449     }
02450     hashtb_start(h->nameprefix_tab, e);
02451     for (npe = e->data; npe != NULL; npe = e->data) {
02452         p = &npe->forwarding;
02453         for (f = npe->forwarding; f != NULL; f = next) {
02454             next = f->next;
02455             if ((f->flags & CCN_FORW_REFRESHED) == 0 ||
02456                   face_from_faceid(h, f->faceid) == NULL) {
02457                 if (h->debug & 2) {
02458                     struct face *face = face_from_faceid(h, f->faceid);
02459                     if (face != NULL) {
02460                         struct ccn_charbuf *prefix = ccn_charbuf_create();
02461                         ccn_name_init(prefix);
02462                         ccn_name_append_components(prefix, e->key, 0, e->keysize);
02463                         ccnd_debug_ccnb(h, __LINE__, "prefix_expiry", face,
02464                                 prefix->buf,
02465                                 prefix->length);
02466                         ccn_charbuf_destroy(&prefix);
02467                     }
02468                 }
02469                 *p = next;
02470                 free(f);
02471                 f = NULL;
02472                 continue;
02473             }
02474             f->expires -= CCN_FWU_SECS;
02475             if (f->expires <= 0)
02476                 f->flags &= ~CCN_FORW_REFRESHED;
02477             p = &(f->next);
02478         }
02479         hashtb_next(e);
02480     }
02481     hashtb_end(e);
02482     h->forward_to_gen += 1;
02483     return(CCN_FWU_SECS*1000000);
02484 }
02485 
02486 /**
02487  * Make sure a call to age_forwarding is scheduled.
02488  */
02489 static void
02490 age_forwarding_needed(struct ccnd_handle *h)
02491 {
02492     if (h->age_forwarding == NULL)
02493         h->age_forwarding = ccn_schedule_event(h->sched,
02494                                                CCN_FWU_SECS*1000000,
02495                                                age_forwarding,
02496                                                NULL, 0);
02497 }
02498 
02499 /**
02500  * Look up a forwarding entry, creating it if it is not there.
02501  */
02502 static struct ccn_forwarding *
02503 seek_forwarding(struct ccnd_handle *h,
02504                 struct nameprefix_entry *npe, unsigned faceid)
02505 {
02506     struct ccn_forwarding *f;
02507     
02508     for (f = npe->forwarding; f != NULL; f = f->next)
02509         if (f->faceid == faceid)
02510             return(f);
02511     f = calloc(1, sizeof(*f));
02512     if (f != NULL) {
02513         f->faceid = faceid;
02514         f->flags = (CCN_FORW_CHILD_INHERIT | CCN_FORW_ACTIVE);
02515         f->expires = 0x7FFFFFFF;
02516         f->next = npe->forwarding;
02517         npe->forwarding = f;
02518     }
02519     return(f);
02520 }
02521 
02522 /**
02523  * Register or update a prefix in the forwarding table (FIB).
02524  *
02525  * @param h is the ccnd handle.
02526  * @param msg is a ccnb-encoded message containing the name prefix somewhere.
02527  * @param comps contains the delimiting offsets for the name components in msg.
02528  * @param ncomps is the number of relevant components.
02529  * @param faceid indicates which face to forward to.
02530  * @param flags are the forwarding entry flags (CCN_FORW_...), -1 for defaults.
02531  * @param expires tells the remaining lifetime, in seconds.
02532  * @returns -1 for error, or new flags upon success; the private flag
02533  *        CCN_FORW_REFRESHED indicates a previously existing entry.
02534  */
02535 static int
02536 ccnd_reg_prefix(struct ccnd_handle *h,
02537                 const unsigned char *msg,
02538                 struct ccn_indexbuf *comps,
02539                 int ncomps,
02540                 unsigned faceid,
02541                 int flags,
02542                 int expires)
02543 {
02544     struct hashtb_enumerator ee;
02545     struct hashtb_enumerator *e = &ee;
02546     struct ccn_forwarding *f = NULL;
02547     struct nameprefix_entry *npe = NULL;
02548     int res;
02549     struct face *face = NULL;
02550     
02551     if (flags >= 0 &&
02552         (flags & CCN_FORW_PUBMASK) != flags)
02553         return(-1);
02554     face = face_from_faceid(h, faceid);
02555     if (face == NULL)
02556         return(-1);
02557     /* This is a bit hacky, but it gives us a way to set CCN_FACE_DC */
02558     if (flags >= 0 && (flags & CCN_FORW_LAST) != 0)
02559         face->flags |= CCN_FACE_DC;
02560     hashtb_start(h->nameprefix_tab, e);
02561     res = nameprefix_seek(h, e, msg, comps, ncomps);
02562     if (res >= 0) {
02563         res = (res == HT_OLD_ENTRY) ? CCN_FORW_REFRESHED : 0;
02564         npe = e->data;
02565         f = seek_forwarding(h, npe, faceid);
02566         if (f != NULL) {
02567             h->forward_to_gen += 1; // XXX - too conservative, should check changes
02568             f->expires = expires;
02569             if (flags < 0)
02570                 flags = f->flags & CCN_FORW_PUBMASK;
02571             f->flags = (CCN_FORW_REFRESHED | flags);
02572             res |= flags;
02573             if (h->debug & (2 | 4)) {
02574                 struct ccn_charbuf *prefix = ccn_charbuf_create();
02575                 struct ccn_charbuf *debugtag = ccn_charbuf_create();
02576                 ccn_charbuf_putf(debugtag, "prefix,ff=%s%x",
02577                                  flags > 9 ? "0x" : "", flags);
02578                 if (f->expires < (1 << 30))
02579                     ccn_charbuf_putf(debugtag, ",sec=%d", expires);
02580                 ccn_name_init(prefix);
02581                 ccn_name_append_components(prefix, msg,
02582                                            comps->buf[0], comps->buf[ncomps]);
02583                 ccnd_debug_ccnb(h, __LINE__,
02584                                 ccn_charbuf_as_string(debugtag),
02585                                 face,
02586                                 prefix->buf,
02587                                 prefix->length);
02588                 ccn_charbuf_destroy(&prefix);
02589                 ccn_charbuf_destroy(&debugtag);
02590             }
02591         }
02592         else
02593             res = -1;
02594     }
02595     hashtb_end(e);
02596     if (res >= 0)
02597         update_npe_children(h, npe, faceid);
02598     return(res);
02599 }
02600 
02601 /**
02602  * Register a prefix, expressed in the form of a URI.
02603  * @returns negative value for error, or new face flags for success.
02604  */
02605 int
02606 ccnd_reg_uri(struct ccnd_handle *h,
02607              const char *uri,
02608              unsigned faceid,
02609              int flags,
02610              int expires)
02611 {
02612     struct ccn_charbuf *name;
02613     struct ccn_buf_decoder decoder;
02614     struct ccn_buf_decoder *d;
02615     struct ccn_indexbuf *comps;
02616     int res;
02617     
02618     name = ccn_charbuf_create();
02619     ccn_name_init(name);
02620     res = ccn_name_from_uri(name, uri);
02621     if (res < 0)
02622         goto Bail;
02623     comps = ccn_indexbuf_create();
02624     d = ccn_buf_decoder_start(&decoder, name->buf, name->length);
02625     res = ccn_parse_Name(d, comps);
02626     if (res < 0)
02627         goto Bail;
02628     res = ccnd_reg_prefix(h, name->buf, comps, comps->n - 1,
02629                           faceid, flags, expires);
02630 Bail:
02631     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&name);
02632     ccn_indexbuf_destroy(&comps);
02633     return(res);
02634 }
02635 
02636 /**
02637  * Register prefixes, expressed in the form of a list of URIs.
02638  * The URIs in the charbuf are each terminated by nul.
02639  */
02640 void
02641 ccnd_reg_uri_list(struct ccnd_handle *h,
02642              struct ccn_charbuf *uris,
02643              unsigned faceid,
02644              int flags,
02645              int expires)
02646 {
02647     size_t i;
02648     const char *s;
02649     s = ccn_charbuf_as_string(uris);
02650     for (i = 0; i + 1 < uris->length; i += strlen(s + i) + 1)
02651         ccnd_reg_uri(h, s + i, faceid, flags, expires);
02652 }
02653 
02654 /**
02655  * Called when a face is first created, and (perhaps) a second time in the case
02656  * that a face transitions from the undecided state.
02657  */
02658 static void
02659 register_new_face(struct ccnd_handle *h, struct face *face)
02660 {
02661     if (face->faceid != 0 && (face->flags & (CCN_FACE_UNDECIDED | CCN_FACE_PASSIVE)) == 0) {
02662         ccnd_face_status_change(h, face->faceid);
02663         if (h->flood && h->autoreg != NULL && (face->flags & CCN_FACE_GG) == 0)
02664             ccnd_reg_uri_list(h, h->autoreg, face->faceid,
02665                               CCN_FORW_CAPTURE_OK | CCN_FORW_CHILD_INHERIT | CCN_FORW_ACTIVE,
02666                               0x7FFFFFFF);
02667         ccn_link_state_init(h, face);
02668     }
02669 }
02670 
02671 /**
02672  * Replaces contents of reply_body with a ccnb-encoded StatusResponse.
02673  *
02674  * @returns CCN_CONTENT_NACK, or -1 in case of error.
02675  */
02676 static int
02677 ccnd_nack(struct ccnd_handle *h, struct ccn_charbuf *reply_body,
02678           int errcode, const char *errtext)
02679 {
02680     int res;
02681     reply_body->length = 0;
02682     res = ccn_encode_StatusResponse(reply_body, errcode, errtext);
02683     if (res == 0)
02684         res = CCN_CONTENT_NACK;
02685     return(res);
02686 }
02687 
02688 /**
02689  * Check that indicated ccndid matches ours.
02690  *
02691  * Fills reply_body with a StatusResponse in case of no match.
02692  *
02693  * @returns 0 if OK, or CCN_CONTENT_NACK if not.
02694  */
02695 static int
02696 check_ccndid(struct ccnd_handle *h,
02697              const void *p, size_t sz, struct ccn_charbuf *reply_body)
02698 {
02699     if (sz != sizeof(h->ccnd_id) || memcmp(p, h->ccnd_id, sz) != 0)
02700         return(ccnd_nack(h, reply_body, 531, "missing or incorrect ccndid"));
02701     return(0);
02702 }
02703 
02704 /**
02705  * Check ccndid, given a face instance.
02706  */
02707 static int
02708 check_face_instance_ccndid(struct ccnd_handle *h,
02709     struct ccn_face_instance *f, struct ccn_charbuf *reply_body)
02710 {
02711     return(check_ccndid(h, f->ccnd_id, f->ccnd_id_size, reply_body));
02712 }
02713 
02714 /**
02715  * Check ccndid, given a parsed ForwardingEntry.
02716  */
02717 static int
02718 check_forwarding_entry_ccndid(struct ccnd_handle *h,
02719     struct ccn_forwarding_entry *f, struct ccn_charbuf *reply_body)
02720 {
02721     return(check_ccndid(h, f->ccnd_id, f->ccnd_id_size, reply_body));
02722 }
02723 
02724 /**
02725  * Process a newface request for the ccnd internal client.
02726  *
02727  * @param h is the ccnd handle
02728  * @param msg points to a ccnd-encoded ContentObject containing a
02729  *         FaceInstance in its Content.
02730  * @param size is its size in bytes
02731  * @param reply_body is a buffer to hold the Content of the reply, as a
02732  *         FaceInstance including faceid
02733  * @returns 0 for success, negative for no response, or CCN_CONTENT_NACK to
02734  *         set the response type to NACK.
02735  *
02736  * Is is permitted for the face to already exist.
02737  * A newly created face will have no registered prefixes, and so will not
02738  * receive any traffic.
02739  */
02740 int
02741 ccnd_req_newface(struct ccnd_handle *h,
02742                  const unsigned char *msg, size_t size,
02743                  struct ccn_charbuf *reply_body)
02744 {
02745     struct ccn_parsed_ContentObject pco = {0};
02746     int res;
02747     const unsigned char *req;
02748     size_t req_size;
02749     struct ccn_face_instance *face_instance = NULL;
02750     struct addrinfo hints = {0};
02751     struct addrinfo *addrinfo = NULL;
02752     int mcast;
02753     struct face *face = NULL;
02754     struct face *reqface = NULL;
02755     struct face *newface = NULL;
02756     int save;
02757     int nackallowed = 0;
02758 
02759     save = h->flood;
02760     h->flood = 0; /* never auto-register for these */
02761     res = ccn_parse_ContentObject(msg, size, &pco, NULL);
02762     if (res < 0)
02763         goto Finish;
02764     res = ccn_content_get_value(msg, size, &pco, &req, &req_size);
02765     if (res < 0)
02766         goto Finish;
02767     res = -1;
02768     face_instance = ccn_face_instance_parse(req, req_size);
02769     if (face_instance == NULL || face_instance->action == NULL)
02770         goto Finish;
02771     if (strcmp(face_instance->action, "newface") != 0)
02772         goto Finish;
02773     /* consider the source ... */
02774     reqface = face_from_faceid(h, h->interest_faceid);
02775     if (reqface == NULL ||
02776         (reqface->flags & (CCN_FACE_LOOPBACK | CCN_FACE_LOCAL)) == 0)
02777         goto Finish;
02778     nackallowed = 1;
02779     res = check_face_instance_ccndid(h, face_instance, reply_body);
02780     if (res != 0)
02781         goto Finish;
02782     if (face_instance->descr.ipproto != IPPROTO_UDP &&
02783         face_instance->descr.ipproto != IPPROTO_TCP) {
02784         res = ccnd_nack(h, reply_body, 504, "parameter error");
02785         goto Finish;
02786     }
02787     if (face_instance->descr.address == NULL) {
02788         res = ccnd_nack(h, reply_body, 504, "parameter error");
02789         goto Finish;
02790     }
02791     if (face_instance->descr.port == NULL) {
02792         res = ccnd_nack(h, reply_body, 504, "parameter error");
02793         goto Finish;
02794     }
02795     if ((reqface->flags & CCN_FACE_GG) == 0) {
02796         res = ccnd_nack(h, reply_body, 430, "not authorized");
02797         goto Finish;
02798     }
02799     hints.ai_flags |= AI_NUMERICHOST;
02800     hints.ai_protocol = face_instance->descr.ipproto;
02801     hints.ai_socktype = (hints.ai_protocol == IPPROTO_UDP) ? SOCK_DGRAM : SOCK_STREAM;
02802     res = getaddrinfo(face_instance->descr.address,
02803                       face_instance->descr.port,
02804                       &hints,
02805                       &addrinfo);
02806     if (res != 0 || (h->debug & 128) != 0)
02807         ccnd_msg(h, "ccnd_req_newface from %u: getaddrinfo(%s, %s, ...) returned %d",
02808                  h->interest_faceid,
02809                  face_instance->descr.address,
02810                  face_instance->descr.port,
02811                  res);
02812     if (res != 0 || addrinfo == NULL) {
02813         res = ccnd_nack(h, reply_body, 501, "syntax error in address");
02814         goto Finish;
02815     }
02816     if (addrinfo->ai_next != NULL)
02817         ccnd_msg(h, "ccnd_req_newface: (addrinfo->ai_next != NULL) ? ?");
02818     if (face_instance->descr.ipproto == IPPROTO_UDP) {
02819         mcast = 0;
02820         if (addrinfo->ai_family == AF_INET) {
02821             face = face_from_faceid(h, h->ipv4_faceid);
02822             mcast = IN_MULTICAST(ntohl(((struct sockaddr_in *)(addrinfo->ai_addr))->sin_addr.s_addr));
02823         }
02824         else if (addrinfo->ai_family == AF_INET6) {
02825             face = face_from_faceid(h, h->ipv6_faceid);
02826             mcast = IN6_IS_ADDR_MULTICAST(&((struct sockaddr_in6 *)addrinfo->ai_addr)->sin6_addr);
02827         }
02828         if (mcast)
02829             face = setup_multicast(h, face_instance,
02830                                    addrinfo->ai_addr,
02831                                    addrinfo->ai_addrlen);
02832         if (face == NULL) {
02833             res = ccnd_nack(h, reply_body, 453, "could not setup multicast");
02834             goto Finish;
02835         }
02836         newface = get_dgram_source(h, face,
02837                                    addrinfo->ai_addr,
02838                                    addrinfo->ai_addrlen,
02839                                    0);
02840     }
02841     else if (addrinfo->ai_socktype == SOCK_STREAM) {
02842         newface = make_connection(h,
02843                                   addrinfo->ai_addr,
02844                                   addrinfo->ai_addrlen,
02845                                   0);
02846     }
02847     if (newface != NULL) {
02848         newface->flags |= CCN_FACE_PERMANENT;
02849         face_instance->action = NULL;
02850         face_instance->ccnd_id = h->ccnd_id;
02851         face_instance->ccnd_id_size = sizeof(h->ccnd_id);
02852         face_instance->faceid = newface->faceid;
02853         face_instance->lifetime = 0x7FFFFFFF;
02854         /*
02855          * A short lifetime is a clue to the client that
02856          * the connection has not been completed.
02857          */
02858         if ((newface->flags & CCN_FACE_CONNECTING) != 0)
02859             face_instance->lifetime = 1;
02860         res = ccnb_append_face_instance(reply_body, face_instance);
02861         if (res > 0)
02862             res = 0;
02863     }
02864     else
02865         res = ccnd_nack(h, reply_body, 450, "could not create face");
02866 Finish:
02867     h->flood = save; /* restore saved flood flag */
02868     ccn_face_instance_destroy(&face_instance);
02869     if (addrinfo != NULL)
02870         freeaddrinfo(addrinfo);
02871     return((nackallowed || res <= 0) ? res : -1);
02872 }
02873 
02874 /**
02875  * @brief Process a destroyface request for the ccnd internal client.
02876  * @param h is the ccnd handle
02877  * @param msg points to a ccnd-encoded ContentObject containing a FaceInstance
02878             in its Content.
02879  * @param size is its size in bytes
02880  * @param reply_body is a buffer to hold the Content of the reply, as a
02881  *         FaceInstance including faceid
02882  * @returns 0 for success, negative for no response, or CCN_CONTENT_NACK to
02883  *         set the response type to NACK.
02884  *
02885  * Is is an error if the face does not exist.
02886  */
02887 int
02888 ccnd_req_destroyface(struct ccnd_handle *h,
02889                      const unsigned char *msg, size_t size,
02890                      struct ccn_charbuf *reply_body)
02891 {
02892     struct ccn_parsed_ContentObject pco = {0};
02893     int res;
02894     int at = 0;
02895     const unsigned char *req;
02896     size_t req_size;
02897     struct ccn_face_instance *face_instance = NULL;
02898     struct face *reqface = NULL;
02899     int nackallowed = 0;
02900 
02901     res = ccn_parse_ContentObject(msg, size, &pco, NULL);
02902     if (res < 0) { at = __LINE__; goto Finish; }
02903     res = ccn_content_get_value(msg, size, &pco, &req, &req_size);
02904     if (res < 0) { at = __LINE__; goto Finish; }
02905     res = -1;
02906     face_instance = ccn_face_instance_parse(req, req_size);
02907     if (face_instance == NULL) { at = __LINE__; goto Finish; }
02908     if (face_instance->action == NULL) { at = __LINE__; goto Finish; }
02909     /* consider the source ... */
02910     reqface = face_from_faceid(h, h->interest_faceid);
02911     if (reqface == NULL) { at = __LINE__; goto Finish; }
02912     if ((reqface->flags & CCN_FACE_GG) == 0) { at = __LINE__; goto Finish; }
02913     nackallowed = 1;
02914     if (strcmp(face_instance->action, "destroyface") != 0)
02915         { at = __LINE__; goto Finish; }
02916     res = check_face_instance_ccndid(h, face_instance, reply_body);
02917     if (res != 0)
02918         { at = __LINE__; goto Finish; }
02919     if (face_instance->faceid == 0) { at = __LINE__; goto Finish; }
02920     res = ccnd_destroy_face(h, face_instance->faceid);
02921     if (res < 0) { at = __LINE__; goto Finish; }
02922     face_instance->action = NULL;
02923     face_instance->ccnd_id = h->ccnd_id;
02924     face_instance->ccnd_id_size = sizeof(h->ccnd_id);
02925     face_instance->lifetime = 0;
02926     res = ccnb_append_face_instance(reply_body, face_instance);
02927     if (res < 0) {
02928         at = __LINE__;
02929     }
02930 Finish:
02931     if (at != 0) {
02932         ccnd_msg(h, "ccnd_req_destroyface failed (line %d, res %d)", at, res);
02933         if (reqface == NULL || (reqface->flags & CCN_FACE_GG) == 0)
02934             res = -1;
02935         else
02936             res = ccnd_nack(h, reply_body, 450, "could not destroy face");
02937     }
02938     ccn_face_instance_destroy(&face_instance);
02939     return((nackallowed || res <= 0) ? res : -1);
02940 }
02941 
02942 /**
02943  * Worker bee for two very similar public functions.
02944  */
02945 static int
02946 ccnd_req_prefix_or_self_reg(struct ccnd_handle *h,
02947                             const unsigned char *msg, size_t size, int selfreg,
02948                             struct ccn_charbuf *reply_body)
02949 {
02950     struct ccn_parsed_ContentObject pco = {0};
02951     int res;
02952     const unsigned char *req;
02953     size_t req_size;
02954     struct ccn_forwarding_entry *forwarding_entry = NULL;
02955     struct face *face = NULL;
02956     struct face *reqface = NULL;
02957     struct ccn_indexbuf *comps = NULL;
02958     int nackallowed = 0;
02959 
02960     res = ccn_parse_ContentObject(msg, size, &pco, NULL);
02961     if (res < 0)
02962         goto Finish;
02963     res = ccn_content_get_value(msg, size, &pco, &req, &req_size);
02964     if (res < 0)
02965         goto Finish;
02966     res = -1;
02967     forwarding_entry = ccn_forwarding_entry_parse(req, req_size);
02968     if (forwarding_entry == NULL || forwarding_entry->action == NULL)
02969         goto Finish;
02970     /* consider the source ... */
02971     reqface = face_from_faceid(h, h->interest_faceid);
02972     if (reqface == NULL)
02973         goto Finish;
02974     if ((reqface->flags & (CCN_FACE_GG | CCN_FACE_REGOK)) == 0)
02975         goto Finish;
02976     nackallowed = 1;
02977     if (selfreg) {
02978         if (strcmp(forwarding_entry->action, "selfreg") != 0)
02979             goto Finish;
02980         if (forwarding_entry->faceid == CCN_NOFACEID)
02981             forwarding_entry->faceid = h->interest_faceid;
02982         else if (forwarding_entry->faceid != h->interest_faceid)
02983             goto Finish;
02984     }
02985     else {
02986         if (strcmp(forwarding_entry->action, "prefixreg") != 0)
02987         goto Finish;
02988     }
02989     if (forwarding_entry->name_prefix == NULL)
02990         goto Finish;
02991     if (forwarding_entry->ccnd_id_size == sizeof(h->ccnd_id)) {
02992         if (memcmp(forwarding_entry->ccnd_id,
02993                    h->ccnd_id, sizeof(h->ccnd_id)) != 0)
02994             goto Finish;
02995     }
02996     else if (forwarding_entry->ccnd_id_size != 0)
02997         goto Finish;
02998     face = face_from_faceid(h, forwarding_entry->faceid);
02999     if (face == NULL)
03000         goto Finish;
03001     if (forwarding_entry->lifetime < 0)
03002         forwarding_entry->lifetime = 2000000000;
03003     else if (forwarding_entry->lifetime > 3600 &&
03004              forwarding_entry->lifetime < (1 << 30))
03005         forwarding_entry->lifetime = 300;
03006     comps = ccn_indexbuf_create();
03007     res = ccn_name_split(forwarding_entry->name_prefix, comps);
03008     if (res < 0)
03009         goto Finish;
03010     res = ccnd_reg_prefix(h,
03011                           forwarding_entry->name_prefix->buf, comps, res,
03012                           face->faceid,
03013                           forwarding_entry->flags,
03014                           forwarding_entry->lifetime);
03015     if (res < 0)
03016         goto Finish;
03017     forwarding_entry->flags = res;
03018     forwarding_entry->action = NULL;
03019     forwarding_entry->ccnd_id = h->ccnd_id;
03020     forwarding_entry->ccnd_id_size = sizeof(h->ccnd_id);
03021     res = ccnb_append_forwarding_entry(reply_body, forwarding_entry);
03022     if (res > 0)
03023         res = 0;
03024 Finish:
03025     ccn_forwarding_entry_destroy(&forwarding_entry);
03026     ccn_indexbuf_destroy(&comps);
03027     if (nackallowed && res < 0)
03028         res = ccnd_nack(h, reply_body, 450, "could not register prefix");
03029     return((nackallowed || res <= 0) ? res : -1);
03030 }
03031 
03032 /**
03033  * @brief Process a prefixreg request for the ccnd internal client.
03034  * @param h is the ccnd handle
03035  * @param msg points to a ccnd-encoded ContentObject containing a
03036  *          ForwardingEntry in its Content.
03037  * @param size is its size in bytes
03038  * @param reply_body is a buffer to hold the Content of the reply, as a
03039  *         FaceInstance including faceid
03040  * @returns 0 for success, negative for no response, or CCN_CONTENT_NACK to
03041  *         set the response type to NACK.
03042  *
03043  */
03044 int
03045 ccnd_req_prefixreg(struct ccnd_handle *h,
03046                    const unsigned char *msg, size_t size,
03047                    struct ccn_charbuf *reply_body)
03048 {
03049     return(ccnd_req_prefix_or_self_reg(h, msg, size, 0, reply_body));
03050 }
03051 
03052 /**
03053  * @brief Process a selfreg request for the ccnd internal client.
03054  * @param h is the ccnd handle
03055  * @param msg points to a ccnd-encoded ContentObject containing a
03056  *          ForwardingEntry in its Content.
03057  * @param size is its size in bytes
03058  * @param reply_body is a buffer to hold the Content of the reply, as a
03059  *         ccnb-encoded ForwardingEntry
03060  * @returns 0 for success, negative for no response, or CCN_CONTENT_NACK to
03061  *         set the response type to NACK.
03062  *
03063  */
03064 int
03065 ccnd_req_selfreg(struct ccnd_handle *h,
03066                  const unsigned char *msg, size_t size,
03067                  struct ccn_charbuf *reply_body)
03068 {
03069     return(ccnd_req_prefix_or_self_reg(h, msg, size, 1, reply_body));
03070 }
03071 
03072 /**
03073  * @brief Process an unreg request for the ccnd internal client.
03074  * @param h is the ccnd handle
03075  * @param msg points to a ccnd-encoded ContentObject containing a
03076  *          ForwardingEntry in its Content.
03077  * @param size is its size in bytes
03078  * @param reply_body is a buffer to hold the Content of the reply, as a
03079  *         ccnb-encoded ForwardingEntry
03080  * @returns 0 for success, negative for no response, or CCN_CONTENT_NACK to
03081  *         set the response type to NACK.
03082  *
03083  */
03084 int
03085 ccnd_req_unreg(struct ccnd_handle *h,
03086                const unsigned char *msg, size_t size,
03087                struct ccn_charbuf *reply_body)
03088 {
03089     struct ccn_parsed_ContentObject pco = {0};
03090     int n_name_comp = 0;
03091     int res;
03092     const unsigned char *req;
03093     size_t req_size;
03094     size_t start;
03095     size_t stop;
03096     int found;
03097     struct ccn_forwarding_entry *forwarding_entry = NULL;
03098     struct face *face = NULL;
03099     struct face *reqface = NULL;
03100     struct ccn_indexbuf *comps = NULL;
03101     struct ccn_forwarding **p = NULL;
03102     struct ccn_forwarding *f = NULL;
03103     struct nameprefix_entry *npe = NULL;
03104     int nackallowed = 0;
03105     
03106     res = ccn_parse_ContentObject(msg, size, &pco, NULL);
03107     if (res < 0)
03108         goto Finish;        
03109     res = ccn_content_get_value(msg, size, &pco, &req, &req_size);
03110     if (res < 0)
03111         goto Finish;
03112     res = -1;
03113     forwarding_entry = ccn_forwarding_entry_parse(req, req_size);
03114     /* consider the source ... */
03115     reqface = face_from_faceid(h, h->interest_faceid);
03116     if (reqface == NULL || (reqface->flags & CCN_FACE_GG) == 0)
03117         goto Finish;
03118     nackallowed = 1;
03119     if (forwarding_entry == NULL || forwarding_entry->action == NULL)
03120         goto Finish;
03121     if (strcmp(forwarding_entry->action, "unreg") != 0)
03122         goto Finish;
03123     if (forwarding_entry->faceid == CCN_NOFACEID)
03124         goto Finish;
03125     if (forwarding_entry->name_prefix == NULL)
03126         goto Finish;
03127     res = check_forwarding_entry_ccndid(h, forwarding_entry, reply_body);
03128     if (res != 0)
03129         goto Finish;
03130     res = -1;
03131     face = face_from_faceid(h, forwarding_entry->faceid);
03132     if (face == NULL)
03133         goto Finish;
03134     comps = ccn_indexbuf_create();
03135     n_name_comp = ccn_name_split(forwarding_entry->name_prefix, comps);
03136     if (n_name_comp < 0)
03137         goto Finish;
03138     if (n_name_comp + 1 > comps->n)
03139         goto Finish;
03140     start = comps->buf[0];
03141     stop = comps->buf[n_name_comp];
03142     npe = hashtb_lookup(h->nameprefix_tab,
03143                         forwarding_entry->name_prefix->buf + start,
03144                         stop - start);
03145     if (npe == NULL)
03146         goto Finish;
03147     found = 0;
03148     p = &npe->forwarding;
03149     for (f = npe->forwarding; f != NULL; f = f->next) {
03150         if (f->faceid == forwarding_entry->faceid) {
03151             found = 1;
03152             if (h->debug & (2 | 4))
03153                 ccnd_debug_ccnb(h, __LINE__, "prefix_unreg", face,
03154                                 forwarding_entry->name_prefix->buf,
03155                                 forwarding_entry->name_prefix->length);
03156             *p = f->next;
03157             free(f);
03158             f = NULL;
03159             h->forward_to_gen += 1;
03160             break;
03161         }
03162         p = &(f->next);
03163     }
03164     if (!found)
03165         goto Finish;    
03166     forwarding_entry->action = NULL;
03167     forwarding_entry->ccnd_id = h->ccnd_id;
03168     forwarding_entry->ccnd_id_size = sizeof(h->ccnd_id);
03169     res = ccnb_append_forwarding_entry(reply_body, forwarding_entry);
03170     if (res > 0)
03171         res = 0;
03172 Finish:
03173     ccn_forwarding_entry_destroy(&forwarding_entry);
03174     ccn_indexbuf_destroy(&comps);
03175     if (nackallowed && res < 0)
03176         res = ccnd_nack(h, reply_body, 450, "could not unregister prefix");
03177     return((nackallowed || res <= 0) ? res : -1);
03178 }
03179 
03180 /**
03181  * Set up forward_to list for a name prefix entry.
03182  *
03183  * Recomputes the contents of npe->forward_to and npe->flags
03184  * from forwarding lists of npe and all of its ancestors.
03185  */
03186 static void
03187 update_forward_to(struct ccnd_handle *h, struct nameprefix_entry *npe)
03188 {
03189     struct ccn_indexbuf *x = NULL;
03190     struct ccn_indexbuf *tap = NULL;
03191     struct ccn_forwarding *f = NULL;
03192     struct nameprefix_entry *p = NULL;
03193     unsigned tflags;
03194     unsigned wantflags;
03195     unsigned moreflags;
03196     unsigned lastfaceid;
03197     unsigned namespace_flags;
03198 
03199     x = npe->forward_to;
03200     if (x == NULL)
03201         npe->forward_to = x = ccn_indexbuf_create();
03202     else
03203         x->n = 0;
03204     wantflags = CCN_FORW_ACTIVE;
03205     lastfaceid = CCN_NOFACEID;
03206     namespace_flags = 0;
03207     for (p = npe; p != NULL; p = p->parent) {
03208         moreflags = CCN_FORW_CHILD_INHERIT;
03209         for (f = p->forwarding; f != NULL; f = f->next) {
03210             if (face_from_faceid(h, f->faceid) == NULL)
03211                 continue;
03212             /* The sense of this flag needs to be inverted for this test */
03213             tflags = f->flags ^ CCN_FORW_CAPTURE_OK;
03214             if ((tflags & wantflags) == wantflags) {
03215                 if (h->debug & 32)
03216                     ccnd_msg(h, "fwd.%d adding %u", __LINE__, f->faceid);
03217                 ccn_indexbuf_set_insert(x, f->faceid);
03218                 if ((f->flags & CCN_FORW_TAP) != 0) {
03219                     if (tap == NULL)
03220                         tap = ccn_indexbuf_create();
03221                     ccn_indexbuf_set_insert(tap, f->faceid);
03222                 }
03223                 if ((f->flags & CCN_FORW_LAST) != 0)
03224                     lastfaceid = f->faceid;
03225             }
03226             namespace_flags |= f->flags;
03227             if ((f->flags & CCN_FORW_CAPTURE) != 0)
03228                 moreflags |= CCN_FORW_CAPTURE_OK;
03229         }
03230         wantflags |= moreflags;
03231     }
03232     if (lastfaceid != CCN_NOFACEID)
03233         ccn_indexbuf_move_to_end(x, lastfaceid);
03234     npe->flags = namespace_flags;
03235     npe->fgen = h->forward_to_gen;
03236     if (x->n == 0)
03237         ccn_indexbuf_destroy(&npe->forward_to);
03238     ccn_indexbuf_destroy(&npe->tap);
03239     npe->tap = tap;
03240 }
03241 
03242 /**
03243  * This is where we consult the interest forwarding table.
03244  * @param h is the ccnd handle
03245  * @param from is the handle for the originating face (may be NULL).
03246  * @param msg points to the ccnb-encoded interest message
03247  * @param pi must be the parse information for msg
03248  * @param npe should be the result of the prefix lookup
03249  * @result Newly allocated set of outgoing faceids (never NULL)
03250  */
03251 static struct ccn_indexbuf *
03252 get_outbound_faces(struct ccnd_handle *h,
03253     struct face *from,
03254     const unsigned char *msg,
03255     struct ccn_parsed_interest *pi,
03256     struct nameprefix_entry *npe)
03257 {
03258     int checkmask = 0;
03259     int wantmask = 0;
03260     struct ccn_indexbuf *x;
03261     struct face *face;
03262     int i;
03263     int n;
03264     unsigned faceid;
03265     
03266     while (npe->parent != NULL && npe->forwarding == NULL)
03267         npe = npe->parent;
03268     if (npe->fgen != h->forward_to_gen)
03269         update_forward_to(h, npe);
03270     x = ccn_indexbuf_create();
03271     if (pi->scope == 0)
03272         return(x);
03273     if (from != NULL && (from->flags & CCN_FACE_GG) != 0) {
03274         i = ccn_fetch_tagged_nonNegativeInteger(CCN_DTAG_FaceID, msg,
03275               pi->offset[CCN_PI_B_OTHER], pi->offset[CCN_PI_E_OTHER]);
03276         if (i != -1) {
03277             faceid = i;
03278             ccn_indexbuf_append_element(x, faceid);
03279             if (h->debug & 32)
03280                 ccnd_msg(h, "outbound.%d adding %u", __LINE__, faceid);
03281             return(x);
03282         }
03283     }
03284     if (npe->forward_to == NULL || npe->forward_to->n == 0)
03285         return(x);
03286     if ((npe->flags & CCN_FORW_LOCAL) != 0)
03287         checkmask = (from != NULL && (from->flags & CCN_FACE_GG) != 0) ? CCN_FACE_GG : (~0);
03288     else if (pi->scope == 1)
03289         checkmask = CCN_FACE_GG;
03290     else if (pi->scope == 2)
03291         checkmask = from ? (CCN_FACE_GG & ~(from->flags)) : ~0;
03292     wantmask = checkmask;
03293     if (wantmask == CCN_FACE_GG)
03294         checkmask |= CCN_FACE_DC;
03295     for (n = npe->forward_to->n, i = 0; i < n; i++) {
03296         faceid = npe->forward_to->buf[i];
03297         face = face_from_faceid(h, faceid);
03298         if (face != NULL && face != from &&
03299             ((face->flags & checkmask) == wantmask)) {
03300             if (h->debug & 32)
03301                 ccnd_msg(h, "outbound.%d adding %u", __LINE__, face->faceid);
03302             ccn_indexbuf_append_element(x, face->faceid);
03303         }
03304     }
03305     return(x);
03306 }
03307 
03308 /**
03309  * Compute the delay until the next timed action on an interest.
03310  */
03311 static int
03312 ie_next_usec(struct ccnd_handle *h, struct interest_entry *ie,
03313              ccn_wrappedtime *expiry)
03314 {
03315     struct pit_face_item *p;
03316     ccn_wrappedtime base;
03317     ccn_wrappedtime delta;
03318     ccn_wrappedtime mn;
03319     int ans;
03320     int debug = (h->debug & 32) != 0;
03321     const int horizon = 3 * WTHZ; /* complain if we get behind by too much */
03322     
03323     base = h->wtnow - horizon;
03324     mn = 600 * WTHZ + horizon;
03325     for (p = ie->pfl; p != NULL; p = p->next) {
03326         delta = p->expiry - base;
03327         if (delta >= 0x80000000)
03328             debug = 1;
03329         if (debug) {
03330             static const char fmt_ie_next_usec[] = 
03331               "ie_next_usec.%d now%+d i=%u f=%04x %u "
03332               " %02X%02X%02X-%02X%02X-%02X%02X-%02X%02X-%02X%02X%02X";
03333             ccnd_msg(h, fmt_ie_next_usec, __LINE__,
03334                      (int)delta - horizon, ie->serial, p->pfi_flags, p->faceid,
03335                      p->nonce[0], p->nonce[1], p->nonce[2], p->nonce[3],
03336                      p->nonce[4], p->nonce[5], p->nonce[6], p->nonce[7],
03337                      p->nonce[8], p->nonce[9], p->nonce[10], p->nonce[11]);
03338         }
03339         if (delta < mn)
03340             mn = delta;
03341     }
03342     if (mn < horizon)
03343         mn = 0;
03344     else
03345         mn -= horizon;
03346     ans = mn * (1000000 / WTHZ);
03347     if (expiry != NULL) {
03348         *expiry = h->wtnow + mn;
03349         if (debug)
03350             ccnd_msg(h, "ie_next_usec.%d expiry=%x", __LINE__,
03351                      (unsigned)*expiry);
03352     }
03353     if (debug)
03354         ccnd_msg(h, "ie_next_usec.%d %d usec", __LINE__, ans);
03355     return(ans);
03356 }
03357 
03358 /**
03359  *  Forward an interest message
03360  *
03361  *  x is downstream (the interest came x).
03362  *  p is upstream (the interest is to be forwarded to p).
03363  *  @returns p (or its reallocated replacement).
03364  */
03365 static struct pit_face_item *
03366 send_interest(struct ccnd_handle *h, struct interest_entry *ie,
03367               struct pit_face_item *x, struct pit_face_item *p)
03368 {
03369     struct face *face = NULL;
03370     struct ccn_charbuf *c = h->send_interest_scratch;
03371     const intmax_t default_life = CCN_INTEREST_LIFETIME_SEC << 12;
03372     intmax_t lifetime = default_life;
03373     ccn_wrappedtime delta;
03374     size_t noncesize;
03375     
03376     face = face_from_faceid(h, p->faceid);
03377     if (face == NULL)
03378         return(p);
03379     h->interest_faceid = x->faceid; /* relevant if p is face 0 */
03380     p = pfi_copy_nonce(h, ie, p, x);
03381     delta = x->expiry - x->renewed;
03382     lifetime = (intmax_t)delta * 4096 / WTHZ;
03383     /* clip lifetime against various limits here */
03384     lifetime = (((lifetime + 511) >> 9) << 9); /* round up - 1/8 sec */
03385     p->renewed = h->wtnow;
03386     p->expiry = h->wtnow + (lifetime * WTHZ / 4096);
03387     ccn_charbuf_reset(c);
03388     if (lifetime != default_life)
03389         ccnb_append_tagged_binary_number(c, CCN_DTAG_InterestLifetime, lifetime);
03390     noncesize = p->pfi_flags & CCND_PFI_NONCESZ;
03391     if (noncesize != 0)
03392         ccnb_append_tagged_blob(c, CCN_DTAG_Nonce, p->nonce, noncesize);
03393     ccn_charbuf_append_closer(c);
03394     h->interests_sent += 1;
03395     p->pfi_flags |= CCND_PFI_UPENDING;
03396     p->pfi_flags &= ~(CCND_PFI_SENDUPST | CCND_PFI_UPHUNGRY);
03397     ccnd_meter_bump(h, face->meter[FM_INTO], 1);
03398     stuff_and_send(h, face, ie->interest_msg, ie->size - 1, c->buf, c->length, (h->debug & 2) ? "interest_to" : NULL, __LINE__);
03399     return(p);
03400 }
03401 
03402 /**
03403  * Find the entry for the longest name prefix that contains forwarding info
03404  */
03405 struct nameprefix_entry *
03406 get_fib_npe(struct ccnd_handle *h, struct interest_entry *ie)
03407 {
03408     struct nameprefix_entry *npe;
03409     
03410     for (npe = ie->ll.npe; npe != NULL; npe = npe->parent)
03411         if (npe->forwarding != NULL)
03412             return(npe);
03413     return(NULL);
03414 }
03415 
03416 /** Implementation detail for strategy_settimer */
03417 static int
03418 strategy_timer(struct ccn_schedule *sched,
03419              void *clienth,
03420              struct ccn_scheduled_event *ev,
03421              int flags)
03422 {
03423     struct ccnd_handle *h = clienth;
03424     struct interest_entry *ie = ev->evdata;
03425     struct ccn_strategy *s = &ie->strategy;
03426 
03427     if (s->ev == ev)
03428         s->ev = NULL;
03429     if (flags & CCN_SCHEDULE_CANCEL)
03430         return(0);
03431     strategy_callout(h, ie, (enum ccn_strategy_op)ev->evint);
03432     return(0);
03433 }
03434 
03435 /**
03436  * Schedule a strategy wakeup
03437  *
03438  * Any previously wakeup will be cancelled.
03439  */
03440 static void
03441 strategy_settimer(struct ccnd_handle *h, struct interest_entry *ie,
03442                   int usec, enum ccn_strategy_op op)
03443 {
03444     struct ccn_strategy *s = &ie->strategy;
03445     
03446     if (s->ev != NULL)
03447         ccn_schedule_cancel(h->sched, s->ev);
03448     if (op == CCNST_NOP)
03449         return;
03450     s->ev = ccn_schedule_event(h->sched, usec, strategy_timer, ie, op);
03451 }
03452 
03453 /**
03454  * This implements the default strategy.
03455  *
03456  * Eventually there will be a way to have other strategies.
03457  */
03458 static void
03459 strategy_callout(struct ccnd_handle *h,
03460                  struct interest_entry *ie,
03461                  enum ccn_strategy_op op)
03462 {
03463     struct pit_face_item *x = NULL;
03464     struct pit_face_item *p = NULL;
03465     struct nameprefix_entry *npe = NULL;
03466     struct ccn_indexbuf *tap = NULL;
03467     unsigned best = CCN_NOFACEID;
03468     unsigned randlow, randrange;
03469     unsigned nleft;
03470     unsigned amt;
03471     int usec;
03472     int usefirst;
03473     
03474     switch (op) {
03475         case CCNST_NOP:
03476             break;
03477         case CCNST_FIRST:
03478             
03479             npe = get_fib_npe(h, ie);
03480             if (npe != NULL)
03481                 tap = npe->tap;
03482             npe = ie->ll.npe;
03483             best = npe->src;
03484             if (best == CCN_NOFACEID)
03485                 best = npe->src = npe->osrc;
03486             /* Find our downstream; right now there should be just one. */
03487             for (x = ie->pfl; x != NULL; x = x->next)
03488                 if ((x->pfi_flags & CCND_PFI_DNSTREAM) != 0)
03489                     break;
03490             if (x == NULL || (x->pfi_flags & CCND_PFI_PENDING) == 0) {
03491                 ccnd_debug_ccnb(h, __LINE__, "canthappen", NULL,
03492                                 ie->interest_msg, ie->size);
03493                 break;
03494             }
03495             if (best == CCN_NOFACEID || npe->usec > 150000) {
03496                 usefirst = 1;
03497                 randlow = 4000;
03498                 randrange = 75000;
03499             }
03500             else {
03501                 usefirst = 0;
03502                 randlow = npe->usec;
03503                 randrange = (randlow + 1) / 2;
03504             }
03505             nleft = 0;
03506             for (p = ie->pfl; p!= NULL; p = p->next) {
03507                 if ((p->pfi_flags & CCND_PFI_UPSTREAM) != 0) {
03508                     if (p->faceid == best) {
03509                         p = send_interest(h, ie, x, p);
03510                         strategy_settimer(h, ie, npe->usec, CCNST_TIMER);
03511                     }
03512                     else if (ccn_indexbuf_member(tap, p->faceid) >= 0)
03513                         p = send_interest(h, ie, x, p);
03514                     else if (usefirst) {
03515                         usefirst = 0;
03516                         pfi_set_expiry_from_micros(h, ie, p, 0);
03517                     }
03518                     else if (p->faceid == npe->osrc)
03519                         pfi_set_expiry_from_micros(h, ie, p, randlow);
03520                     else {
03521                         /* Want to preserve the order of the rest */
03522                         nleft++;
03523                         p->pfi_flags |= CCND_PFI_SENDUPST;
03524                     }
03525                 }
03526             }
03527             if (nleft > 0) {
03528                 /* Send remainder in order, with randomized timing */
03529                 amt = (2 * randrange + nleft - 1) / nleft;
03530                 if (amt == 0) amt = 1; /* paranoia - should never happen */
03531                 usec = randlow;
03532                 for (p = ie->pfl; p!= NULL; p = p->next) {
03533                     if ((p->pfi_flags & CCND_PFI_SENDUPST) != 0) {
03534                         pfi_set_expiry_from_micros(h, ie, p, usec);
03535                         usec += nrand48(h->seed) % amt;
03536                     }
03537                 }
03538             }
03539             break;
03540         case CCNST_TIMER:
03541             /*
03542              * Our best choice has not responded in time.
03543              * Increase the predicted response.
03544              */
03545             adjust_predicted_response(h, ie, 1);
03546             break;
03547         case CCNST_SATISFIED:
03548             break;
03549         case CCNST_TIMEOUT:
03550             break;
03551     }
03552 }
03553 
03554 /**
03555  * Execute the next timed action on a propagating interest.
03556  */
03557 static int
03558 do_propagate(struct ccn_schedule *sched,
03559              void *clienth,
03560              struct ccn_scheduled_event *ev,
03561              int flags)
03562 {
03563     struct ccnd_handle *h = clienth;
03564     struct interest_entry *ie = ev->evdata;
03565     struct face *face = NULL;
03566     struct pit_face_item *p = NULL;
03567     struct pit_face_item *next = NULL;
03568     struct pit_face_item *d[3] = { NULL, NULL, NULL };
03569     ccn_wrappedtime now;
03570     int next_delay;
03571     int i;
03572     int n;
03573     int pending;
03574     int upstreams;
03575     unsigned life;
03576     unsigned mn;
03577     unsigned rem;
03578     
03579     if (ie->ev == ev)
03580         ie->ev = NULL;
03581     if (flags & CCN_SCHEDULE_CANCEL)
03582         return(0);
03583     now = h->wtnow;  /* capture our reference */
03584     mn = 600 * WTHZ; /* keep track of when we should wake up again */
03585     pending = 0;
03586     n = 0;
03587     for (p = ie->pfl; p != NULL; p = next) {
03588         next = p->next;
03589         if ((p->pfi_flags & CCND_PFI_DNSTREAM) != 0) {
03590             if (wt_compare(p->expiry, now) <= 0) {
03591                 if (h->debug & 2)
03592                     ccnd_debug_ccnb(h, __LINE__, "interest_expiry",
03593                                     face_from_faceid(h, p->faceid),
03594                                     ie->interest_msg, ie->size);
03595                 pfi_destroy(h, ie, p);
03596                 continue;
03597             }
03598             if ((p->pfi_flags & CCND_PFI_PENDING) == 0)
03599                 continue;
03600             rem = p->expiry - now;
03601             if (rem < mn)
03602                 mn = rem;
03603             pending++;
03604             /* If this downstream will expire soon, don't use it */
03605             life = p->expiry - p->renewed;
03606             if (rem * 8 <= life)
03607                 continue;
03608             /* keep track of the 2 longest-lasting downstreams */
03609             for (i = n; i > 0 && wt_compare(d[i-1]->expiry, p->expiry) < 0; i--)
03610                 d[i] = d[i-1];
03611             d[i] = p;
03612             if (n < 2)
03613                 n++;
03614         }
03615     }
03616     /* Send the interests out */
03617     upstreams = 0; /* Count unexpired upstreams */
03618     for (p = ie->pfl; p != NULL; p = next) {
03619         next = p->next;
03620         if ((p->pfi_flags & CCND_PFI_UPSTREAM) == 0)
03621             continue;
03622         face = face_from_faceid(h, p->faceid);
03623         if (face == NULL || (face->flags & CCN_FACE_NOSEND) != 0) {
03624             pfi_destroy(h, ie, p);
03625             continue;
03626         }
03627         if ((face->flags & CCN_FACE_DC) != 0 &&
03628             (p->pfi_flags & CCND_PFI_DCFACE) == 0) {
03629             /* Add 60 ms extra delay before sending to a DC face */
03630             p->expiry += (60 * WTHZ + 999) / 1000;
03631             p->pfi_flags |= CCND_PFI_DCFACE;
03632         }
03633         if (wt_compare(now + 1, p->expiry) < 0) {
03634             /* Not expired yet */
03635             rem = p->expiry - now;
03636             if (rem < mn)
03637                 mn = rem;
03638             upstreams++;
03639             continue;
03640         }
03641         for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
03642             if (d[i]->faceid != p->faceid)
03643                 break;
03644         if (i < n) {
03645             p = send_interest(h, ie, d[i], p);
03646             upstreams++;
03647             rem = p->expiry - now;
03648             if (rem < mn)
03649                 mn = rem;
03650         }
03651         else {
03652             /* Upstream expired, but we have nothing to feed it. */
03653             p->pfi_flags |= CCND_PFI_UPHUNGRY;
03654         }
03655     }
03656     if (pending == 0 && upstreams == 0) {
03657         strategy_callout(h, ie, CCNST_TIMEOUT);
03658         consume_interest(h, ie);
03659         return(0);
03660     }
03661     /* Determine when we need to run again */
03662     if (mn == 0) abort();
03663     next_delay = mn * (1000000 / WTHZ);
03664     ev->evint = h->wtnow + mn;
03665     ie->ev = ev;
03666     return(next_delay);
03667 }
03668 
03669 /**
03670  * Append an interest Nonce value that is useful for debugging.
03671  *
03672  * This does leak some information about the origin of interests, but it
03673  * also makes it easier to figure out what is happening.
03674  *
03675  * The debug nonce is 12 bytes long.  When converted to hexadecimal and
03676  * broken into fields (big-endian style), it looks like
03677  *
03678  *   IIIIII-PPPP-FFFF-SSss-XXXXXX
03679  *
03680  * where
03681  *   IIIIII - first 24 bits of the CCNDID.
03682  *   PPPP   - pid of the ccnd.
03683  *   FFFF   - 16 low-order bits of the faceid.
03684  *   SSss   - local time modulo 256 seconds, with 8 bits of fraction
03685  *   XXXXXX - 24 random bits.
03686  */
03687 static int
03688 ccnd_debug_nonce(struct ccnd_handle *h, struct face *face, unsigned char *s) {
03689     int i;
03690     
03691     for (i = 0; i < 3; i++)
03692         s[i] = h->ccnd_id[i];
03693     s[i++] = h->logpid >> 8;
03694     s[i++] = h->logpid;
03695     s[i++] = face->faceid >> 8;
03696     s[i++] = face->faceid;
03697     s[i++] = h->sec;
03698     s[i++] = h->usec * 256 / 1000000;
03699     for (; i < TYPICAL_NONCE_SIZE; i++)
03700         s[i] = nrand48(h->seed);
03701     return(i);
03702 }
03703 
03704 /**
03705  * Append a random interest Nonce value.
03706  *
03707  * For production use, although this uses a simple PRNG.
03708  */
03709 static int
03710 ccnd_plain_nonce(struct ccnd_handle *h, struct face *face, unsigned char *s) {
03711     int noncebytes = 6;
03712     int i;
03713     
03714     for (i = 0; i < noncebytes; i++)
03715         s[i] = nrand48(h->seed);
03716     return(i);
03717 }
03718 
03719 /**
03720  * Compare two wrapped time values
03721  *
03722  * @returns negative if a < b, 0 if a == b, positive if a > b
03723  */
03724 static int
03725 wt_compare(ccn_wrappedtime a, ccn_wrappedtime b)
03726 {
03727     ccn_wrappedtime delta = a - b;
03728     if (delta >= 0x80000000)
03729         return(-1);
03730     return(delta > 0);
03731 }
03732 
03733 /** Used in just one place; could go away */
03734 static struct pit_face_item *
03735 pfi_create(struct ccnd_handle *h,
03736            unsigned faceid, unsigned flags,
03737            const unsigned char *nonce, size_t noncesize,
03738            struct pit_face_item **pp)
03739 {
03740     struct pit_face_item *p;    
03741     size_t nsize = TYPICAL_NONCE_SIZE;
03742     
03743     if (noncesize > CCND_PFI_NONCESZ) return(NULL);
03744     if (noncesize > nsize)
03745         nsize = noncesize;
03746     p = calloc(1, sizeof(*p) + nsize - TYPICAL_NONCE_SIZE);
03747     if (p == NULL) return(NULL);
03748     p->faceid = faceid;
03749     p->renewed = h->wtnow;
03750     p->expiry = h->wtnow;
03751     p->pfi_flags = (flags & ~CCND_PFI_NONCESZ) + noncesize;
03752     memcpy(p->nonce, nonce, noncesize);
03753     if (pp != NULL) {
03754         p->next = *pp;
03755         *pp = p;
03756     }
03757     return(p);    
03758 }
03759 
03760 /** Remove the pit face item from the interest entry */
03761 static void
03762 pfi_destroy(struct ccnd_handle *h, struct interest_entry *ie,
03763             struct pit_face_item *p)
03764 {
03765     struct face *face = NULL;
03766     struct pit_face_item **pp;
03767     
03768     for (pp = &ie->pfl; *pp != p; pp = &(*pp)->next) {
03769         if (*pp == NULL) abort();
03770     }
03771     if ((p->pfi_flags & CCND_PFI_PENDING) != 0) {
03772         face = face_from_faceid(h, p->faceid);
03773         if (face != NULL)
03774             face->pending_interests -= 1;
03775     }
03776     *pp = p->next;
03777     free(p);
03778 }
03779 
03780 /**
03781  * Find the pit face item with the given flag set,
03782  * or create it if not present.
03783  *
03784  * New items are appended to the end of the list
03785  */
03786 static struct pit_face_item *
03787 pfi_seek(struct ccnd_handle *h, struct interest_entry *ie,
03788          unsigned faceid, unsigned pfi_flag)
03789 {
03790     struct pit_face_item *p;
03791     struct pit_face_item **pp;
03792     
03793     for (pp = &ie->pfl, p = ie->pfl; p != NULL; pp = &p->next, p = p->next) {
03794         if (p->faceid == faceid && (p->pfi_flags & pfi_flag) != 0)
03795             return(p);
03796     }
03797     p = calloc(1, sizeof(*p));
03798     if (p != NULL) {
03799         p->faceid = faceid;
03800         p->pfi_flags = pfi_flag;
03801         p->expiry = h->wtnow;
03802         *pp = p;
03803     }
03804     return(p);
03805 }
03806 
03807 /**
03808  * Set the expiry of the pit face item based upon an interest lifetime
03809  *
03810  * lifetime is in the units specified by the CCNx protocal - 1/4096 sec
03811  *
03812  * Also sets the renewed timestamp to now.
03813  */
03814 static void
03815 pfi_set_expiry_from_lifetime(struct ccnd_handle *h, struct interest_entry *ie,
03816                              struct pit_face_item *p, intmax_t lifetime)
03817 {
03818     ccn_wrappedtime delta;
03819     ccn_wrappedtime odelta;
03820     int minlifetime = 4096 / 4;
03821     unsigned maxlifetime = 7 * 24 * 3600 * 4096U; /* one week */
03822     
03823     if (lifetime < minlifetime)
03824         lifetime = minlifetime;
03825     if (lifetime > maxlifetime)
03826         lifetime = maxlifetime;
03827     lifetime = (((lifetime + 511) >> 9) << 9); /* round up - 1/8 sec */
03828     delta = ((uintmax_t)lifetime * WTHZ + 4095U) / 4096U;
03829     odelta = p->expiry - h->wtnow;
03830     if (delta < odelta && odelta < 0x80000000)
03831         ccnd_msg(h, "pfi_set_expiry_from_lifetime.%d Oops", __LINE__);
03832     p->renewed = h->wtnow;
03833     p->expiry = h->wtnow + delta;
03834 }
03835 
03836 /**
03837  * Set the expiry of the pit face item using a time in microseconds from present
03838  *
03839  * Does not set the renewed timestamp.
03840  */
03841 static void
03842 pfi_set_expiry_from_micros(struct ccnd_handle *h, struct interest_entry *ie,
03843                            struct pit_face_item *p, unsigned micros)
03844 {
03845     ccn_wrappedtime delta;
03846     
03847     delta = (micros + (1000000 / WTHZ - 1)) / (1000000 / WTHZ);
03848     p->expiry = h->wtnow + delta;
03849 }
03850 
03851 /**
03852  * Set the nonce in a pit face item
03853  *
03854  * @returns the replacement value, which is p unless the nonce will not fit.
03855  */
03856 static struct pit_face_item *
03857 pfi_set_nonce(struct ccnd_handle *h, struct interest_entry *ie,
03858              struct pit_face_item *p,
03859              const unsigned char *nonce, size_t noncesize)
03860 {
03861     struct pit_face_item *q = NULL;    
03862     size_t nsize;
03863     
03864     nsize = (p->pfi_flags & CCND_PFI_NONCESZ);
03865     if (noncesize != nsize) {
03866         if (noncesize > TYPICAL_NONCE_SIZE) {
03867             /* Hard case, need to reallocate */
03868             q = pfi_create(h, p->faceid, p->pfi_flags,
03869                            nonce, noncesize, &p->next);
03870             if (q != NULL) {
03871                 q->renewed = p->renewed;
03872                 q->expiry = p->expiry;
03873                 p->pfi_flags = 0; /* preserve pending interest accounting */
03874                 pfi_destroy(h, ie, p);
03875             }
03876             return(q);
03877         }
03878         p->pfi_flags = (p->pfi_flags & ~CCND_PFI_NONCESZ) + noncesize;
03879     }
03880     memcpy(p->nonce, nonce, noncesize);
03881     return(p);
03882 }
03883 
03884 /**
03885  * Return true iff the nonce in p matches the given one.
03886  */
03887 static int
03888 pfi_nonce_matches(struct pit_face_item *p,
03889                   const unsigned char *nonce, size_t size)
03890 {
03891     if (p == NULL)
03892         return(0);
03893     if (size != (p->pfi_flags & CCND_PFI_NONCESZ))
03894         return(0);
03895     if (memcmp(nonce, p->nonce, size) != 0)
03896         return(0);
03897     return(1);
03898 }
03899 
03900 /**
03901  * Copy a nonce from src into p
03902  *
03903  * @returns p (or its replacement)
03904  */
03905 static struct pit_face_item *
03906 pfi_copy_nonce(struct ccnd_handle *h, struct interest_entry *ie,
03907              struct pit_face_item *p, const struct pit_face_item *src)
03908 {
03909     p = pfi_set_nonce(h, ie, p, src->nonce, src->pfi_flags & CCND_PFI_NONCESZ);
03910     return(p);
03911 }
03912 
03913 /**
03914  * True iff the nonce in p does not occur in any of the other items of the entry
03915  */
03916 static int
03917 pfi_unique_nonce(struct ccnd_handle *h, struct interest_entry *ie,
03918                  struct pit_face_item *p)
03919 {
03920     struct pit_face_item *q = NULL;
03921     size_t nsize;
03922     
03923     if (p == NULL)
03924         return(1);
03925     nsize = (p->pfi_flags & CCND_PFI_NONCESZ);
03926     for (q = ie->pfl; q != NULL; q = q->next) {
03927         if (q != p && pfi_nonce_matches(q, p->nonce, nsize))
03928             return(0);
03929     }
03930     return(1);
03931 }
03932 
03933 /**
03934  * Schedules the propagation of an Interest message.
03935  */
03936 static int
03937 propagate_interest(struct ccnd_handle *h,
03938                    struct face *face,
03939                    unsigned char *msg,
03940                    struct ccn_parsed_interest *pi,
03941                    struct nameprefix_entry *npe)
03942 {
03943     struct hashtb_enumerator ee;
03944     struct hashtb_enumerator *e = &ee;
03945     struct pit_face_item *p = NULL;
03946     struct interest_entry *ie = NULL;
03947     struct ccn_indexbuf *outbound = NULL;
03948     const unsigned char *nonce;
03949     intmax_t lifetime;
03950     ccn_wrappedtime expiry;
03951     unsigned char cb[TYPICAL_NONCE_SIZE];
03952     size_t noncesize;
03953     unsigned faceid;
03954     int i;
03955     int res;
03956     int usec;
03957     
03958     faceid = face->faceid;
03959     hashtb_start(h->interest_tab, e);
03960     res = hashtb_seek(e, msg, pi->offset[CCN_PI_B_InterestLifetime], 1);
03961     if (res < 0) goto Bail;
03962     ie = e->data;
03963     if (res == HT_NEW_ENTRY) {
03964         ie->serial = ++h->iserial;
03965         ie->strategy.birth = h->wtnow;
03966         ie->strategy.renewed = h->wtnow;
03967         ie->strategy.renewals = 0;
03968     }
03969     if (ie->interest_msg == NULL) {
03970         struct ccn_parsed_interest xpi = {0};
03971         int xres;
03972         link_interest_entry_to_nameprefix(h, ie, npe);
03973         ie->interest_msg = e->key;
03974         ie->size = pi->offset[CCN_PI_B_InterestLifetime] + 1;
03975         /* Ugly bit, this.  Clear the extension byte. */
03976         ((unsigned char *)(intptr_t)ie->interest_msg)[ie->size - 1] = 0;
03977         xres = ccn_parse_interest(ie->interest_msg, ie->size, &xpi, NULL);
03978         if (xres < 0) abort();
03979     }
03980     lifetime = ccn_interest_lifetime(msg, pi);
03981     outbound = get_outbound_faces(h, face, msg, pi, npe);
03982     if (outbound == NULL) goto Bail;
03983     nonce = msg + pi->offset[CCN_PI_B_Nonce];
03984     noncesize = pi->offset[CCN_PI_E_Nonce] - pi->offset[CCN_PI_B_Nonce];
03985     if (noncesize != 0)
03986         ccn_ref_tagged_BLOB(CCN_DTAG_Nonce, msg,
03987                             pi->offset[CCN_PI_B_Nonce],
03988                             pi->offset[CCN_PI_E_Nonce],
03989                             &nonce, &noncesize);
03990     else {
03991         /* This interest has no nonce; generate one before going on */
03992         noncesize = (h->noncegen)(h, face, cb);
03993         nonce = cb;
03994     }
03995     p = pfi_seek(h, ie, faceid, CCND_PFI_DNSTREAM);
03996     p = pfi_set_nonce(h, ie, p, nonce, noncesize);
03997     if (nonce == cb || pfi_unique_nonce(h, ie, p)) {
03998         ie->strategy.renewed = h->wtnow;
03999         ie->strategy.renewals += 1;
04000         if ((p->pfi_flags & CCND_PFI_PENDING) == 0) {
04001             p->pfi_flags |= CCND_PFI_PENDING;
04002             face->pending_interests += 1;
04003         }
04004     }
04005     else {
04006         /* Nonce has been seen before; do not forward. */
04007         p->pfi_flags |= CCND_PFI_SUPDATA;
04008     }
04009     pfi_set_expiry_from_lifetime(h, ie, p, lifetime);
04010     for (i = 0; i < outbound->n; i++) {
04011         p = pfi_seek(h, ie, outbound->buf[i], CCND_PFI_UPSTREAM);
04012         if (wt_compare(p->expiry, h->wtnow) < 0) {
04013             p->expiry = h->wtnow + 1; // ZZZZ - the +1 may be overkill here.
04014             p->pfi_flags &= ~CCND_PFI_UPHUNGRY;
04015         }
04016     }
04017     if (res == HT_NEW_ENTRY)
04018         strategy_callout(h, ie, CCNST_FIRST);
04019     usec = ie_next_usec(h, ie, &expiry);
04020     if (ie->ev != NULL && wt_compare(expiry + 2, ie->ev->evint) < 0)
04021         ccn_schedule_cancel(h->sched, ie->ev);
04022     if (ie->ev == NULL)
04023         ie->ev = ccn_schedule_event(h->sched, usec, do_propagate, ie, expiry);
04024 Bail:
04025     hashtb_end(e);
04026     ccn_indexbuf_destroy(&outbound);
04027     return(res);
04028 }
04029 
04030 /**
04031  * We have a FIB change - accelerate forwarding of existing interests
04032  */
04033 static void
04034 update_npe_children(struct ccnd_handle *h, struct nameprefix_entry *npe, unsigned faceid)
04035 {
04036     struct hashtb_enumerator ee;
04037     struct hashtb_enumerator *e = &ee;
04038     struct face *fface = NULL;
04039     struct ccn_parsed_interest pi;
04040     struct pit_face_item *p = NULL;
04041     struct interest_entry *ie = NULL;
04042     struct nameprefix_entry *x = NULL;
04043     struct ccn_indexbuf *ob = NULL;
04044     int i;
04045     unsigned usec = 6000; /*  a bit of time for prefix reg  */
04046 
04047     hashtb_start(h->interest_tab, e);
04048     for (ie = e->data; ie != NULL; ie = e->data) {
04049         for (x = ie->ll.npe; x != NULL; x = x->parent) {
04050             if (x == npe) {
04051                 for (fface = NULL, p = ie->pfl; p != NULL; p = p->next) {
04052                     if (p->faceid == faceid) {
04053                         if ((p->pfi_flags & CCND_PFI_UPSTREAM) != 0) {
04054                             fface = NULL;
04055                             break;
04056                         }
04057                     }
04058                     else if ((p->pfi_flags & CCND_PFI_DNSTREAM) != 0) {
04059                         if (fface == NULL || (fface->flags & CCN_FACE_GG) == 0)
04060                             fface = face_from_faceid(h, p->faceid);
04061                     }
04062                 }
04063                 if (fface != NULL) {
04064                     ccn_parse_interest(ie->interest_msg, ie->size, &pi, NULL);
04065                     ob = get_outbound_faces(h, fface, ie->interest_msg,
04066                                             &pi, ie->ll.npe);
04067                     for (i = 0; i < ob->n; i++) {
04068                         if (ob->buf[i] == faceid) {
04069                             p = pfi_seek(h, ie, faceid, CCND_PFI_UPSTREAM);
04070                             if ((p->pfi_flags & CCND_PFI_UPENDING) == 0) {
04071                                 p->expiry = h->wtnow + usec / (1000000 / WTHZ);
04072                                 usec += 200;
04073                                 if (ie->ev != NULL && wt_compare(p->expiry + 4, ie->ev->evint) < 0)
04074                                     ccn_schedule_cancel(h->sched, ie->ev);
04075                                 if (ie->ev == NULL)
04076                                     ie->ev = ccn_schedule_event(h->sched, usec, do_propagate, ie, p->expiry);
04077                             }
04078                             break;
04079                         }
04080                     }
04081                     ccn_indexbuf_destroy(&ob);
04082                 }
04083                 break;
04084             }
04085         }
04086         hashtb_next(e);
04087     }
04088     hashtb_end(e);
04089 }
04090 
04091 /**
04092  * Creates a nameprefix entry if it does not already exist, together
04093  * with all of its parents.
04094  */
04095 static int
04096 nameprefix_seek(struct ccnd_handle *h, struct hashtb_enumerator *e,
04097                 const unsigned char *msg, struct ccn_indexbuf *comps, int ncomps)
04098 {
04099     int i;
04100     int base;
04101     int res = -1;
04102     struct nameprefix_entry *parent = NULL;
04103     struct nameprefix_entry *npe = NULL;
04104     struct ielinks *head = NULL;
04105 
04106     if (ncomps + 1 > comps->n)
04107         return(-1);
04108     base = comps->buf[0];
04109     for (i = 0; i <= ncomps; i++) {
04110         res = hashtb_seek(e, msg + base, comps->buf[i] - base, 0);
04111         if (res < 0)
04112             break;
04113         npe = e->data;
04114         if (res == HT_NEW_ENTRY) {
04115             head = &npe->ie_head;
04116             head->next = head;
04117             head->prev = head;
04118             head->npe = NULL;
04119             npe->parent = parent;
04120             npe->forwarding = NULL;
04121             npe->fgen = h->forward_to_gen - 1;
04122             npe->forward_to = NULL;
04123             if (parent != NULL) {
04124                 parent->children++;
04125                 npe->flags = parent->flags;
04126                 npe->src = parent->src;
04127                 npe->osrc = parent->osrc;
04128                 npe->usec = parent->usec;
04129             }
04130             else {
04131                 npe->src = npe->osrc = CCN_NOFACEID;
04132                 npe->usec = (nrand48(h->seed) % 4096U) + 8192;
04133             }
04134         }
04135         parent = npe;
04136     }
04137     return(res);
04138 }
04139 
04140 // ZZZZ - not in the most obvious place - move closer to other content table stuff
04141 // XXX - missing doxy
04142 static struct content_entry *
04143 next_child_at_level(struct ccnd_handle *h,
04144                     struct content_entry *content, int level)
04145 {
04146     struct content_entry *next = NULL;
04147     struct ccn_charbuf *name;
04148     struct ccn_indexbuf *pred[CCN_SKIPLIST_MAX_DEPTH] = {NULL};
04149     int d;
04150     int res;
04151     
04152     if (content == NULL)
04153         return(NULL);
04154     if (content->ncomps <= level + 1)
04155         return(NULL);
04156     name = ccn_charbuf_create();
04157     ccn_name_init(name);
04158     res = ccn_name_append_components(name, content->key,
04159                                      content->comps[0],
04160                                      content->comps[level + 1]);
04161     if (res < 0) abort();
04162     res = ccn_name_next_sibling(name);
04163     if (res < 0) abort();
04164     if (h->debug & 8)
04165         ccnd_debug_ccnb(h, __LINE__, "child_successor", NULL,
04166                         name->buf, name->length);
04167     d = content_skiplist_findbefore(h, name->buf, name->length,
04168                                     NULL, pred);
04169     next = content_from_accession(h, pred[0]->buf[0]);
04170     if (next == content) {
04171         // XXX - I think this case should not occur, but just in case, avoid a loop.
04172         next = content_from_accession(h, content_skiplist_next(h, content));
04173         ccnd_debug_ccnb(h, __LINE__, "bump", NULL, next->key, next->size);
04174     }
04175     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&name);
04176     return(next);
04177 }
04178 
04179 /**
04180  * Check whether the interest should be dropped for local namespace reasons
04181  */
04182 static int
04183 drop_nonlocal_interest(struct ccnd_handle *h, struct nameprefix_entry *npe,
04184                        struct face *face,
04185                        unsigned char *msg, size_t size)
04186 {
04187     if (npe->fgen != h->forward_to_gen)
04188         update_forward_to(h, npe);
04189     if ((npe->flags & CCN_FORW_LOCAL) != 0 &&
04190         (face->flags & CCN_FACE_GG) == 0) {
04191         ccnd_debug_ccnb(h, __LINE__, "interest_nonlocal", face, msg, size);
04192         h->interests_dropped += 1;
04193         return (1);
04194     }
04195     return(0);
04196 }
04197 
04198 /**
04199  * Process an incoming interest message.
04200  *
04201  * Parse the Interest and discard if it does not parse.
04202  * Check for correct scope (a scope 0 or scope 1 interest should never
04203  *  arrive on an external face).
04204  * Check for a duplicated Nonce, discard if it has been seen before.
04205  * Look up the name prefix.  Check for a local namespace and discard
04206  *  if an interest in a local namespace arrives from outside.
04207  * Consult the content store.  If a suitable matching ContentObject is found,
04208  *  prepare to send it, consuming this interest and any pending interests
04209  *  on that face that also match this object.
04210  * Otherwise, initiate propagation of the interest.
04211  */
04212 static void
04213 process_incoming_interest(struct ccnd_handle *h, struct face *face,
04214                           unsigned char *msg, size_t size)
04215 {
04216     struct hashtb_enumerator ee;
04217     struct hashtb_enumerator *e = &ee;
04218     struct ccn_parsed_interest parsed_interest = {0};
04219     struct ccn_parsed_interest *pi = &parsed_interest;
04220     size_t namesize = 0;
04221     int k;
04222     int res;
04223     int try;
04224     int matched;
04225     int s_ok;
04226     struct interest_entry *ie = NULL;
04227     struct nameprefix_entry *npe = NULL;
04228     struct content_entry *content = NULL;
04229     struct content_entry *last_match = NULL;
04230     struct ccn_indexbuf *comps = indexbuf_obtain(h);
04231     if (size > 65535)
04232         res = -__LINE__;
04233     else
04234         res = ccn_parse_interest(msg, size, pi, comps);
04235     if (res < 0) {
04236         ccnd_msg(h, "error parsing Interest - code %d", res);
04237         ccn_indexbuf_destroy(&comps);
04238         return;
04239     }
04240     ccnd_meter_bump(h, face->meter[FM_INTI], 1);
04241     if (pi->scope >= 0 && pi->scope < 2 &&
04242              (face->flags & CCN_FACE_GG) == 0) {
04243         ccnd_debug_ccnb(h, __LINE__, "interest_outofscope", face, msg, size);
04244         h->interests_dropped += 1;
04245     }
04246     else {
04247         if (h->debug & (16 | 8 | 2))
04248             ccnd_debug_ccnb(h, __LINE__, "interest_from", face, msg, size);
04249         if (pi->magic < 20090701) {
04250             if (++(h->oldformatinterests) == h->oldformatinterestgrumble) {
04251                 h->oldformatinterestgrumble *= 2;
04252                 ccnd_msg(h, "downrev interests received: %d (%d)",
04253                          h->oldformatinterests,
04254                          pi->magic);
04255             }
04256         }
04257         namesize = comps->buf[pi->prefix_comps] - comps->buf[0];
04258         h->interests_accepted += 1;
04259         ie = hashtb_lookup(h->interest_tab, msg,
04260                            pi->offset[CCN_PI_B_InterestLifetime]);
04261         if (ie != NULL) {
04262             /* Since this is in the PIT, we do not need to check the CS. */
04263             indexbuf_release(h, comps);
04264             comps = NULL;
04265             npe = ie->ll.npe;
04266             if (drop_nonlocal_interest(h, npe, face, msg, size))
04267                 return;
04268             propagate_interest(h, face, msg, pi, npe);
04269             return;
04270         }
04271         if (h->debug & 16) {
04272             /* Only print details that are not already presented */
04273             // ZZZZ - should do nifty Exclude presentation here
04274             ccnd_msg(h,
04275                      "version: %d, "
04276                      "excl: %d bytes, "
04277                      "etc: %d bytes",
04278                      pi->magic,
04279                      pi->offset[CCN_PI_E_Exclude] - pi->offset[CCN_PI_B_Exclude],
04280                      pi->offset[CCN_PI_E_OTHER] - pi->offset[CCN_PI_B_OTHER]);
04281         }
04282         s_ok = (pi->answerfrom & CCN_AOK_STALE) != 0;
04283         matched = 0;
04284         hashtb_start(h->nameprefix_tab, e);
04285         res = nameprefix_seek(h, e, msg, comps, pi->prefix_comps);
04286         npe = e->data;
04287         if (npe == NULL || drop_nonlocal_interest(h, npe, face, msg, size))
04288             goto Bail;
04289         if ((pi->answerfrom & CCN_AOK_CS) != 0) {
04290             last_match = NULL;
04291             content = find_first_match_candidate(h, msg, pi);
04292             if (content != NULL && (h->debug & 8))
04293                 ccnd_debug_ccnb(h, __LINE__, "first_candidate", NULL,
04294                                 content->key,
04295                                 content->size);
04296             if (content != NULL &&
04297                 !content_matches_interest_prefix(h, content, msg, comps,
04298                                                  pi->prefix_comps)) {
04299                 if (h->debug & 8)
04300                     ccnd_debug_ccnb(h, __LINE__, "prefix_mismatch", NULL,
04301                                     msg, size);
04302                 content = NULL;
04303             }
04304             for (try = 0; content != NULL; try++) {
04305                 if ((s_ok || (content->flags & CCN_CONTENT_ENTRY_STALE) == 0) &&
04306                     ccn_content_matches_interest(content->key,
04307                                        content->size,
04308                                        0, NULL, msg, size, pi)) {
04309                     if (h->debug & 8)
04310                         ccnd_debug_ccnb(h, __LINE__, "matches", NULL,
04311                                         content->key,
04312                                         content->size);
04313                     if ((pi->orderpref & 1) == 0) // XXX - should be symbolic
04314                         break;
04315                     last_match = content;
04316                     content = next_child_at_level(h, content, comps->n - 1);
04317                     goto check_next_prefix;
04318                 }
04319                 content = content_from_accession(h, content_skiplist_next(h, content));
04320             check_next_prefix:
04321                 if (content != NULL &&
04322                     !content_matches_interest_prefix(h, content, msg,
04323                                                      comps, pi->prefix_comps)) {
04324                     if (h->debug & 8)
04325                         ccnd_debug_ccnb(h, __LINE__, "prefix_mismatch", NULL,
04326                                         content->key,
04327                                         content->size);
04328                     content = NULL;
04329                 }
04330             }
04331             if (last_match != NULL)
04332                 content = last_match;
04333             if (content != NULL) {
04334                 /* Check to see if we are planning to send already */
04335                 enum cq_delay_class c;
04336                 for (c = 0, k = -1; c < CCN_CQ_N && k == -1; c++)
04337                     if (face->q[c] != NULL)
04338                         k = ccn_indexbuf_member(face->q[c]->send_queue, content->accession);
04339                 if (k == -1) {
04340                     k = face_send_queue_insert(h, face, content);
04341                     if (k >= 0) {
04342                         if (h->debug & (32 | 8))
04343                             ccnd_debug_ccnb(h, __LINE__, "consume", face, msg, size);
04344                     }
04345                     /* Any other matched interests need to be consumed, too. */
04346                     match_interests(h, content, NULL, face, NULL);
04347                 }
04348                 if ((pi->answerfrom & CCN_AOK_EXPIRE) != 0)
04349                     mark_stale(h, content);
04350                 matched = 1;
04351             }
04352         }
04353         if (!matched && npe != NULL && (pi->answerfrom & CCN_AOK_EXPIRE) == 0)
04354             propagate_interest(h, face, msg, pi, npe);
04355     Bail:
04356         hashtb_end(e);
04357     }
04358     indexbuf_release(h, comps);
04359 }
04360 
04361 /**
04362  * Mark content as stale
04363  */
04364 static void
04365 mark_stale(struct ccnd_handle *h, struct content_entry *content)
04366 {
04367     ccn_accession_t accession = content->accession;
04368     if ((content->flags & CCN_CONTENT_ENTRY_STALE) != 0)
04369         return;
04370     if (h->debug & 4)
